title: Civil Unrest with Jason Lee and More
itunes:title: Civil Unrest with Jason Lee and More
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the room Jason Lee, and you know he is all about spilling the tea, and he had a lot to say in wake of the Karen Civil controversy. But he kept civil ironically. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Oklohoma man headed to prison over botched castration surgery at a cabin in the woods. Also Envy and Charlamagne gave some advice to a few listeners for "Ask C and E"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had friend to the room Jason Lee, and you know he is all about spilling the tea, and he had a lot to say in wake of the Karen Civil controversy. But he kept civil ironically. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Oklohoma man headed to prison over botched castration surgery at a cabin in the woods. Also Envy and Charlamagne gave some advice to a few listeners for "Ask C and E"
